effect.Name: Lighter Color
effect.description: Lighter Color - (The effect comes from the Photoshop) Compares the total of all channel values for the blend and base color and displays the higher value color. Lighter Color does not produce a third color, which can result from the Lighten blend, because it chooses the highest channel values from both the base and blend color to create the result color
effect.author: Foxioo
